The receptacles are at locations as follows. countertop3 is at location3. drawer2 is at location15. shelf2 is at location29. stoveburner4 and stoveburner2 are at location21. cabinet4 is at location14. stoveburner3 and stoveburner1 are at location5. cabinet3 is at location16. cabinet5 is at location13. cabinet1 is at location19. microwave1 is at location24. shelf1 is at location17. garbagecan1 is at location8. fridge1 is at location10. drawer1 is at location20. sinkbasin1 is at location6. shelf3 is at location26. drawer3 is at location27. toaster1 is at location9. countertop1 is at location2. cabinet6 is at location4. countertop2 and coffeemachine1 are at location11. cabinet2 is at location22. question: Is the following action applicable in this state: ensure that object bread1 of type breadtype is in a receptacle countertop1 of type countertoptype?
